issue.title: [C++] ORC ExternalProject needs to declare dependency on vendored protobuf
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2745](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2745). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When we vendor ORC and Protobuf, they also need to declare their dependencies on each other. Otherwise they are build in parallel and the ORC build fails.
